Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Evander Kane?

Evander Kane is 33 years old.

When was Evander Kane born?

Evander Kane was born on August 2, 1991.

Where was Evander Kane born?

Evander Kane was born in Vancouver, Canada.

How tall is Evander Kane?

Evander Kane is 6-2 (188 cm) tall.

How much does Evander Kane weigh?

Evander Kane weighs 218 lbs (98 kg).

How many goals does Evander Kane have?

Evander Kane had 326 goals over his career.

How many points does Evander Kane have?

Evander Kane had 617 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Evander Kane won?

Evander Kane has never won a Stanley Cup as a player.
